title: [The Slope, Canyon Rim]
description: Looking out over the lip of the canyon, the moonlit view is spectacular.  Trees line both rims, and below, huge boulders sprout at random out of the brush that fills the floor.  A path leads along the rim to the west, while a small ledge, barely wide enough to travel, moves down the cliff face into the depths below.
